dainEnterPlayTokens._comment: Add tokens to Dwarf allies that enter play if Dain is in play.

dainPassiveTokens._comment: Add/remove tokens on Dwarf characters depending on whether Dain is ready or not.
onDo: Added 1 willpower and 1 attack to each Dwarf character in play.
offDo: removed 1 willpower and 1 attack from each Dwarf character in play.

merryOtherHobbitEnterLeavePlayTokens._comment: Add/remove attack tokens to Merry when other Hobbit heroes enter/leave the owner's control.

merryEnterLeavePlayTokens._comment: Add attack to Merry when Merry enters play.

ethirSwordsmanEnterPlayTokens._comment: Add tokens to allies that enter play if this ally is in play.

ethirSwordsmanPassiveTokens._comment: Add/remove tokens depending on whether this is in play.
onDo: added 1 willpower to each Outlands character in play.
offDo: removed 1 willpower from each Outlands character in play.

warriorOfLossarnachEnterPlayTokens._comment: Add tokens to allies that enter play if this ally is in play.

warriorOfLossarnachPassiveTokens._comment: Add/remove tokens depending on whether this is in play.
onDo: added 1 defense to each Outlands character in play.
offDo: removed 1 defense from each Outlands character in play.

knightsOfTheSwanEnterPlayTokens._comment: Add tokens to allies that enter play if this ally is in play.

knightsOfTheSwanPassiveTokens._comment: Add/remove tokens depending on whether this is in play.
onDo: added 1 attack to each Outlands character in play.
offDo: removed 1 attack from each Outlands character in play.

anfalasHerdsmanEnterPlayTokens._comment: Add tokens to allies that enter play if this ally is in play.

anfalasHerdsmanPassiveTokens._comment: Add/remove tokens depending on whether this is in play.
onDo: added 1 hit point to each Outlands character in play.
offDo: removed 1 hit point from each Outlands character in play.

billEnterPlayTokens._comment: Add tokens to allies that enter play if this ally is in play.

billPassiveTokens._comment: Add/remove tokens depending on whether this is in play.
onDo: added 1 hit point to each Hobbit character in play.
offDo: removed 1 hit point from each Hobbit character in play.
